title: Strengthening HR Management Practical Competencies: Simulation-Based Neonatal Airway Management Training Program

context.prior_knowledge: Basic neonatal physiology and fundamental first-aid skills
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for Corporate Management/HR Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can perform neonatal airway management procedures (endotracheal intubation, bag-mask ventilation, laryngeal mask insertion) with over 80% accuracy.
Learners successfully resolve emergency scenarios at least three times by applying inter-team communication protocols in a simulation environment.
Learners perform standard treatment protocols with 90% compliance in high-pressure simulations resembling real clinical settings.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
